titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1939 LUDLOW, Miss M.S. 56 rue d'Assas 50 rue Vavin
1 m 1 v B 50 dep 50
Apr 26 Doomsday Men May 2 May 2 Murder in the Bud May 6 6 Rebecca May 11 11 Case of the Velvet Claws May 13 13 Dr Bradley Remembers -> May 20 20 Trent Intervenes May 22 22 Eve's Doctor May 30 30 Gone with the Wind Mme Magdelain wants June 9 ren 1m 1v B May 26 - June 26 50 interrupted (left dep.) has 17 days to Nov 26 Nov 9 Care of the Howling Dog Nov 11 Nov 11 " " " Perjured Parrot Nov. 13 13 " " " Cheating Bride Nov. 17 17 Not to be taken Nov 21 " 21 Trent Intervenes Nov 28 28 English Rue Nov 30 Renewed Nov 26 - Dec 26 1939 1 m A 25 Nov 30 Let the People Sing pd 8f Dec. 4 Dec 4 Hornet's Nest Dec. 11 11 Unnatural Death Dec 14 14 This is Mr Fortune Dec 16 16 Gracie Allen Murder Case Dec. 18 18 Oscar Wilde (Harris) Dec 23 23 Case of the Substitute Face Dec 27 27 Reader is warned Jan. 5
Renewed Dec 26 1939 to Jan 26 1940 1 m 1 v 25 Jan 5 Polonaise. 2v. Jan 9 Jan 9 Fox Prowls pd Jan. 15 15 In the teeth of evidence Jan 19 19 Death in Five Boxes Feb 3 Feb 3 Murder in the Bud Feb 12 Renewed Jan 26 - February 26 1940 (paid Feb 3) Feb 12 Black Land White Land Feb 19 Feb 19 Vision, Yeats March 1 March 1 Case of the Shoplifter's Shoe March 13 Renewed Feb 26 - March 26 1940 1vA 25 March 13 Chiffon Scarf. 2v. pd March 21 21 Insanity fair March 29 Dep left will renew later
